鞭.definition: whip or lash; to flog; to whip; conductor's baton; segmented iron weapon (old); penis (of animal, served as food)

鞭打.definition: to whip; to lash; to flog; to thrash

鞭炮.definition: firecrackers; string of small firecrackers; CL:枚[mei2]

鞭笞.definition: to flog; to lash; to whip; to urge or goad along

鞭策.definition: to spur on; to urge on; to encourage sb (e.g. to make progress)

鞭長莫及.definition: lit. the whip cannot reach (idiom); beyond one's influence; too far to be able to help
